S

sequentialGradientInterceptEstimator() - Method in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
Calculates the slope using sequential gradient descent with an initial intercept value of INITIAL_INTERCEPT
sequentialSlopeEstimator() - Method in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
Calculates the slope sequentially using Least Mean Squared (LMS)

numerator = sum( (x[index] - xMean) * (y[index] - yMean))
denominator = sum( (x[index] - xMean)^2 )
slope = numerator / denominator
sequentialSquareResidualSum(double) - Method in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
Calculates the derivative sum squared residuals sequentially
simpleFit() - Method in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
Calculates slope and intercept using sequential Least Mean Squared (LMS) for both calculations
simpleFit(boolean) - Method in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
Calculates the slope and intercept using either sequential or parallel Least Mean Squared (LMS) based upon the value of the parameter parallel.
simpleInterceptEstimator() - Method in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
Calculates the intercept sequentially using Least Mean Squared (LMS)

intercept = yMean - slope * xMean
slope - Variable in class optimized.regression.LinearRegression
A Double which holds the value of the calculated slope.
slope - Variable in class optimized.regression.sumSquareResidualsThread
The Double representing the previously calculated slope/gSlope.
slopeThread - Class in optimized.regression
slopeThread

The constructor of slopeThread.
start - Variable in class optimized.regression.slopeThread
The start of the partition to calculate with.
start - Variable in class optimized.regression.sumSquareResidualsThread
The start of the partition to calculate with.
sumSquareResidualsThread - Class in optimized.regression
sumSquareResidualsThread
